feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts
feed.subtitle: Posts. That have been deleted. From MetaFilter.

entry.title: Vox Populi
entry.content:
Post 197257 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but we really have a glut of Musk / Twitter posts at the moment -- too many to easily keep track of for people just trying to keep up with latest news. Please check the twitter and musk tags, thank you! -- taz
entry.summary: Post 197257 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but we really have a glut of Musk / Twitter posts at the moment -- too many to easily keep track of for people just trying to keep up with latest news. Please check the twitter and musk tags, thank you! -- taz
